resources.string: Thanks to adventurers like you, it became really peaceful up here.
You think there is to much guards in this town? Well that\'s only town with a gigantic dungeon that was taken over by monsters, isn\'t it?
One of the locals. Even though this is clearly a commoner, those clothes does look expensive
Ah! Another adventurer, lovely! Make sure to loot as many valuables as you can!
Town became so wealthy thanks to that dungeon, that everyone in town can afford to go on a vacation whenever we please! In fact that\'s why there is so few people in here right now.
I hope the sewers won\'t get flooded when spring arrives. We don\'t need another rat infestation.
An old man, somehow he looks like someone who would be making wands.
Come back anytime you feel sick or hungry!
I wonder why church doesn\'t allow us to wear hats... it\'s really cold out here.
A regular worker of local establishments.
This guy is a typical shopkeeper. You can tell he already knows your price.
Come back any time, we always happy to see you!
Greetings and welcome to our movie theatre! We provide a special service, you can watch a movie for free, and if you\'ll see it all the through you will be rewarded with %d gold coins!

Welcome my son, welcome to the holy church of great Santa the Depth Lord! Unfortunately I cannot let you pass through, right now building is under reconstruction, but if you seek help, I can provide healing service and food only for 100 gold coins!
A simple wall made of wood logs.
Despite rumors of how popular this place is, for adventurers, there is quite a lot of snow around here, like if nobody ever set their foot outside.
A solid silver cross, a symbol of local religion - \"The Witnesses of Santa the Depth Lord\".
Typical church bell it appears that nobody ringed it for a while, the rope is nowhere to be seen.
Traditionally church bells are installed in tall towers so that the ring could be heard from a great distances.
Stone chimney is a regular companion of houses build in regions often affected by cold weather.
What in world could be behind that door?
Snowman is a traditional town decoration for a holiday season, when people celebrate \"Dungeonmas\" a day, when monsters invaded the dungeon.
It feels kind of weird to look upon a living tree, right next to an entrance to the dungeon, filled with horrors and death.
Somehow this wall emits heat and seems a bit wet.
Seems like there is a shop inside that building.
This floor made of simple wooden planks. What exactly are you looking for?
Luxurious red carpet reserved for a special guests.
This door seems exceptionally well made. It probably leads to something incredible.
I don\'t want to be weird, but by doing so, you literally feeding developers.
Additionally you will receive every single hat from real money store! As well as every single hat that is going to be ever released.
